yacl3.config.skylper.title: Skylper
Decides whether to highlight non-completed collections in the /collections menu.
Decides the color in which a non-completed collection in the /collections menu should be highlighted. This is only applied, when the highlighting is enabled.
Decides whether to highlight non-completed bestiary in the /bestiary menu.
Decides the color in which the non-completed bestiary in the /bestiary menu should be highlighted. This is only applied, when the highlighting is enabled.
yacl3.config.skylper.category.mining.roo: Decides whether to show the Pickaxe Ability cooldown indicator on mining items in the inventory.
Decides whether to show a title when the Pickaxe Ability cooldown is done.
Pickaxe Ability availability notification on mining islands only
Decides whether to only show a title for the Pickaxe Ability cooldown, when on mining islands.
Highlight completed commissions in commissions menu.
Defines the highlighting color of completed commissions.
yacl3.config.skylper.category.mining.gro: Changes preferences about the Total Powder overlay, which shows the total amount of gemstone and mithril powder.
Decides whether the overlay is shown or not.
Changes the x coordinate of the overlay. It can also be changed visually by using the button in the General category.
Changes the y coordinate of the overlay. It can also be changed visually by using the button in the General category.
yacl3.config.skylper.category.hollows.ro: Decides whether to highlight treasure chests or not.
Decides the color a treasure chest should be highlighted in.
Decides whether to highlight the lock particles of a chests or not.
Decides whether the pass, which grants access to the Crystal Hollows, should be automatically renewed or not.
yacl3.config.skylper.category.hollows.gr: Locations from chat
Settings about the structure location recognition in public chats.
Recognize locations
Decides whether to recognize locations sent in public chat.
Automatically add locations
Decides whether to automatically add locations, which are recognized in messages sent in public chat.
yacl3.config.skylper.category.hollows.ro: Click to open a screen, where you can view, share and delete your waypoints.
yacl3.config.skylper.category.hollows.gr: Structure waypoints
Change which waypoints should be shown in the Crystal Hollows.
King Yolkar
Decides whether the waypoint of King Yolkar should be shown.
Goblin Queen
Decides whether the waypoint of Goblin Queen should be shown.
Precursor City
Decides whether the waypoint of the Precursor City should be shown.
Jungle Temple
Decides whether the waypoint of the Jungle Temple should be shown.
Odawa
Decides whether the waypoint of Odawa should be shown.
Khazad-dûm
Decides whether the waypoint of the Khazad-dûm should be shown.
Mines of Divan
Decides whether the waypoint of the Mines of Divan should be shown.
Crystal Nucleus
Decides whether the waypoint of the Crystal Nucleus should be shown.
Fairy Grotto
Decides whether the waypoint of the Fairy Grotto should be shown.
Boss Corleone
Decides whether the waypoint of Boss Corleone should be shown.
Key Guardian
Decides whether the waypoint of Key Guardian should be shown.
Crystal overlay
Changes preferences about the Crystal Overlay, which shows the status of the crystals needed for a nucleus run.
Enabled
Decides whether the overlay is shown or not.
X coordinate
Changes the x coordinate of the overlay. It can also be changed visually by using the button in the General category.
Y coordinate
Changes the y coordinate of the overlay. It can also be changed visually by using the button in the General category.
Powder Grinding Tracker
Changes preferences about the Powder Grinding Tracker, which shows stats about your powder grinding session.
Enabled
Decides whether the overlay is shown or not.
X coordinate
Changes the x coordinate of the overlay. It can also be changed visually by using the button in the General category.
Y coordinate
Changes the y coordinate of the overlay. It can also be changed visually by using the button in the General category.
Total opened chests
Decides whether the total count of opened chests should be displayed in the widget.
Opened chests per minute
Decides whether the count of chest per minute should be displayed in the widget.
Opened chests per hour
Decides whether the count of chest per hour should be displayed in the widget.
Total farmed Gemstone Powder
Decides whether the total amount of farmed Gemstone Powder should be displayed in the widget.
Gemstone Powder per minute
Decides whether the amount of Gemstone Powder per minute should be displayed in the widget.
Gemstone Powder per hour
Decides whether the amount of Gemstone Powder per hour should be displayed in the widget.
Total farmed Mithril Powder
Decides whether the total amount of farmed Mithril Powder should be displayed in the widget.
Mithril Powder per minute
Decides whether the amount of Mithril Powder per minute should be displayed in the widget.
Mithril Powder per hour
Decides whether the amount of Mithril Powder per hour should be displayed in the widget.
Double powder event state
Toggles whether the state of the Double Powder event of the Crystal Hollows should be visible in the widget.
Send a message if you already joined the lobby in the session.
yacl3.config.locations.category.location: Here you can view, delete and share the waypoint in the public chat.
Click here to share this waypoint in the chat.
Click here to delete this waypoint. When executed, the gui will not instantly update. To view the changes here, you have to reopen this screen.
menu.skylper.tabhud.modifier.title: Modify HUD
menu.skylper.tabhud.modifier.caption: Drag the widgets to reorder them.
chat.skylper.hollows.locations.pick: [skylper] Click the structure that this coordinates belongs to: %d
chat.skylper.hollows.pickaxe_cooldown.no: [skylper] No Pickaxe Ability could be found. If this is an error, please open the Heart of the Mountain (/hotm) screen!
